Class AbstractLargestCliqueFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractLargestCliqueFinder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DenseGraphLargestCliqueFinder, SparseGraphLargestCliqueFinder
    public abstract class AbstractLargestCliqueFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class defines the API and common internals of largest clique finding algorithms.

      • isClique

                           java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> clique)
        Checks whether the nodes in clique form a clique.
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph.
        clique - the list of nods of the graph.
        Returns:
